definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The ecological environment in Tarim downstream watershed takes on the trend of worsening, and the soil erosion is serious.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河下游生態環境呈惡化趨勢，水土流失嚴重。

sentences.english: Tarim River is the longest inland River of China, located in the arid of Northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河地處我國西北乾旱區，是中國最長的內陸河。

sentences.english: Tarim River is one longest inland river of China.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河是我國最長的內陸河。

sentences.english: Akesu River is the maximum runoff source flows of Tarim River.
sentences.chinese: 阿克蘇河是塔里木河來水量最大的源流。

sentences.english: The Lower reaches of Tarim River is the ecological frangible zone, belongs to the red ecology area.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河下游是生態環境脆弱區，屬紅色生態區。

definition: Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean

pinyin: Ta3 ke4 la1 ma3 gan1 Sha1 mo4

definition: inland river/river draining to inland sea
Ejin River in Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia

definition: Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
